txt.en: '[placeholder], thank you for joining us here for dinner.'
'Of course, Éothain. I know we have not always seen eye-to-eye, but I do respect your opinions when it comes to matters of strategy.'
'I agree; however, this group of White Hand Orcs might very well be all that remains of a larger group, posing very little threat.'
'I have seen firsthand what they are capable of. If you value Aldburg and its inhabitants, you will do the right thing!'
'How dare you question my dedication to Aldburg and its people? The reason that we are discussing this at all is due to my dedication.'
'First, let me say, while we may have had our disagreements, I appreciate you allowing me this time.'
'Very well. I have seen the treachery and destruction the White Hand is capable of.'
'I am not suggesting that we simply ignore them, but we should focus upon the White Hand.'
'You are right...we are not going to. I believe that I have had enough of this bitter food. I believe this dinner is over.'
'Éothain and I need to resolve our disagreement on the issue of the Orcs, and we were hoping that you could mediate and help us decide the best course of action.'
'I want to do the right thing for our grand city and protect the people at the same time. I can see that we are not going to agree upon a course of action.'
'I will allow Éothain an opportunity to speak first. Please, state your side, cousin of Éomer.'
'The other Orc-tribe troubles me because we know nothing about them. Their number may be great enough to overpower us all.'
'We are vulnerable here in Aldburg, and if we do not defeat them soon, their number may grow beyond our reckoning.'
